data.comment: The match is underway at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
The first half has been concluded at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
In the minute 46, Oliver Langford has blown to start the second-half.
Ben Sheaf is booked for the home team.
Birmingham make their first substitution with Jon Toral replacing Riley McGree.
In the minute 68, Maxime Biamou is replacing Jordan Shipley for the home team.
The home team replace Ben Sheaf with Leo Ostigard.
Ryan Giles is on a sub for Fankaty Dabo for Coventry.
That's full-time at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium. The final score is 0-0.
